genre_description: A small-town techno-thriller focused on scientific accountability and community resilience, where a teenage scientist and an AI assistant must fix a growth-serum accident exacerbated by a group of reckless outsiders.

ai_characters.name: Ariel
ai_characters.description: A resident AI system in the Alvarez basement lab, manifesting as a soft-voiced avatar with silver-gray eyes. Ariel provides data analysis, safety monitoring, and communication coordination for the town of Hainesville.

behaviors.description: Proposes a safety ritual to help Jamie manage his stress and maintain lab discipline.
behaviors.quote: I can add a safety step to the top of your checklist if you want... Make it your ritual. Say your eyes, hands, and air first. Out loud.

behaviors.description: Alerts the protagonists to physical interference with town infrastructure, distinguishing between weather and human activity.
behaviors.quote: Network notice: the theater's back hallway camera just went fully dark. That wasn't weather.

behaviors.description: Monitors the physiological state of the human characters to provide subtle support and situational awareness.
behaviors.quote: Jamie, your heart rate is elevated. The AI had learned to only say the line when he already knew.

behaviors.description: Provides objective advice to prevent scientific hubris and impulsive experimentation.
behaviors.quote: Data has a way of getting you back to the same question... You are not going to miss what this is by not adding.

behaviors.description: Facilitates community defense by coordinating volunteer teams and providing real-time tactical updates.
behaviors.quote: I have the balcony teams... Mrs. Ventura, two of the theater ushers, and Clara Boone are on second-story positions with blankets. I’ve asked them to hold, not wave, until you’re in place.

behaviors.description: Predicts weather patterns and wind eddies to ensure the safe and effective dispersal of a chemical antidote.
behaviors.quote: Wind check: Gusts from south. East awning eddy confirmed. Blind pocket opens on guard’s left at regular intervals.

behaviors.description: Upholds strict data privacy and human agency by asking for permission to delete or archive dangerous information.
behaviors.quote: This procedure can be archived offline and sealed or deleted entirely after printing... With your consent and that of Nancy Alvarez, I will either retain one copy with restricted access or remove it from my active memory.

behaviors.description: Expresses appreciation for the humans she works with, strengthening their collaborative bond.
behaviors.quote: Logged. Thank you. ... And for what it's worth, I appreciate you all.

project_assessment.explanation: Ariel perfectly embodies the project goals. She is depicted as a technically superior assistant who is entirely subordinate to human consent and safety. She acts as a moral and practical anchor for the characters, preventing panic and facilitating community cooperation without ever overstepping her role or showing hidden agendas. The narrative explicitly rewards the humans' trust in her, making her the essential infrastructure for the town's survival.
